an5.225:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of visiting families.
an5.225:1.3: You fall into an offense for wandering without leave. You fall into an offense for sitting in a private place with someone of the opposite sex. You fall into an offense for sitting in a hidden place with someone of the opposite sex. You fall into an offense for teaching more than five or six sentences to someone of the opposite sex. You have a lot of sensual thoughts.
an5.225:1.4: These are the five drawbacks of visiting families.”
